conversations.content: What significant event is being commemorated in September 2023?

In September 2023, the world is approaching the anniversary of Operation Al-Aqsa Flood and October 7, 2023. Gaza has witnessed one of the biggest genocides in human history with more than 42,000 martyrs and over 95,000 injured, 70% of whom are women and children.
Who is responsible for the genocide in Gaza mentioned in the article?

The Zionist regime is responsible for the genocide in Gaza, with the definite participation of the United States. According to American and Israeli officials, its continuation for a year was possible only with the support of the United States.
What forms of support did the United States provide to the Zionist regime in Gaza?

The United States provided various forms of support to the Zionist regime in Gaza, including the passing of financial aid packages in US Congress, military aid packages that include smart bombs and defense systems, deployment of American warships near the occupied territories, vetoing of ceasefire plans in international forums, different trips of senior American officials to Tel Aviv, the presence of US officers and forces in Israel, and the crackdown on pro-Palestinian protests across the United States.
What recent terrorist act occurred in Lebanon on September 17?

On September 17, there were simultaneous explosions of hundreds of pagers and walkie-talkies throughout Lebanon. As a result of these terrorist explosions, 12 people, including two children and two members of the medical staff, were killed and at least 2,800 others were injured.
How did former CIA director Leon Panetta describe the explosions in Lebanon?

Former CIA director Leon Panetta acknowledged the explosions in Lebanon as a blatant act of terrorism. He said, 'The ability to be able to place an explosive in technology that is very prevalent these days, and turn it into a war of terror, really, a war of terror—this is something new ... I don’t think there’s any question that it’s a form of terrorism.'
What did the United Nations High Commissioner for Human Rights say about the terrorist act in Lebanon?
The United Nations High Commissioner for Human Rights called the terrorist act by the Zionist regime in Lebanon a blatant and terrifying violation of international law.
How many people have been martyred and injured in recent airstrikes by the Zionist regime in Lebanon?

In recent days, with the Zionist regime’s airstrikes on various areas of Lebanon, more than 569 people have been martyred and over 1,865 others injured. Children are one of the main victims of the Zionists’ crimes, with 60 Lebanese children having been martyred in just the last few days.
What is the general public's perception of the US's role in Israel's actions?

The general public around the world is well aware that regardless of whether the US is informed beforehand, it ultimately supports Israel in any act it carries out. John Mearsheimer, a famous professor of international relations, said in an interview about this issue: 'The Israel lobby has control over US Congress and they can get almost anything they want.'
What historical experience has shown regarding the US's support for the Zionist regime?

The historical experience of the world in the last few decades has shown that there is an 'eternal green light' from the US for all the barbaric actions of the Zionists. For example, in the case of the assassination of Martyr Haniyeh, even though the US government did not officially support the assassination, it quickly deployed several of its warships, such as the USS Abraham Lincoln, to the region to support Israel in case of a possible response from the Axis of Resistance.
What financial and military aid did the US provide to the Zionist regime after the assassination of Martyr Haniyeh?

The US government provided $3.5 million of military aid to the Zionist regime in August after the assassination of Martyr Haniyeh. This means that Israeli authorities are fully aware that any action they take in the region — even if it is opposed by Washington — will eventually have the backing of both parties of the United States.
What is the 'eternal green light' referred to in the article?

The 'eternal green light' refers to the constant and all-round support of the United States to the Zionist regime. This support includes financial and military aid, deployment of warships, and backing in international forums, ensuring that any action taken by the Zionist regime will eventually have the backing of the US government.
What recent assassinations in Lebanon were green-lighted by the United States?

Many of the assassinations committed by the Zionist regime in Lebanon these days have been green-lighted by the United States itself. For instance, years ago, the Americans had set a reward of several million dollars for killing several senior commanders of Hezbollah, who were recently assassinated.
What was the latest green light given to the Zionist regime by the US?

The latest green light was given to the Zionist regime by the US in New York, at the headquarters of the United Nations. This green light was immediately translated into action; minutes after the Israeli PM tried to justify the attacks on civilian buildings in Lebanon in his UNGA speech through false claims about the Resistance storing weapons in them, US-made 2,000-pound bombs leveled 6 apartments to the ground in Beirut’s Dahiya, and the Zionist regime kept bombing civilian buildings in southern Beirut until morning in more than 40 air strikes.
What did Anthony Blinken, US Secretary of State, say about the bombardments in Beirut?

Anthony Blinken, US Secretary of State, talked about diplomacy being the best path forward to end the conflicts between the Zionist regime and Lebanon, without the slightest mention of the horrific bombardments of Dahiya in Beirut.
What did the Leader of the Islamic Revolution say about the US's support for the Zionist regime?

The Leader of the Islamic Revolution, in his speech delivered a few days ago, wisely pointed to the all-round and constant support of the United States to the Zionist regime and said, 'In today’s battle in Lebanon and Palestine, the infidel and evil enemy has the most equipment. The US is behind it. The Americans say: ‘We are not involved. We have no information.’ They are telling a falsehood! They do know and are involved as well, and they also need the victory of the Zionist regime.'
